popover.primary: A mastery path focused on toe-to-toe combat
A mastery path focused on longer-duration weakening effects
A mastery path focused on surprise attacks and positional combat

data.name: Absolution
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A precision shot to the enemy's vital organs which deals damage based on combo points.
1 Accusation: 227 damage.
2 Accusations: 284 damage.
3 Accusations: 344 damage.
4 Accusations: 402 damage.
5 Accusations: 459 damage.
data.rawDescription:
A precision shot to the enemy's vital organs which deals damage based on combo points.
1 Accusation: {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
2 Accusations: {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
3 Accusations: {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
4 Accusations: {COM_3_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
5 Accusations: {COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Atonement
data.description: Increases Absolution's chance to critically hit by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Increases Absolution's chance to critically hit by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Cleansing
data.description:
You load your pistol with bullets designed to fragment on impact, causing your Executions to deal an additional 225 Spirit damage to the target. The victim will lose 20 Action Points, and you will gain 20 Action Points.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You load your pistol with bullets designed to fragment on impact, causing your Executions to deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to the target. The victim will lose {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}, and you will gain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_2_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Confession
data.description:
You load your pistol with bullets doused in holy water, causing your Executions to deal an additional 225 Spirit damage. Any healing abilities that the victim uses over the next 5 seconds will become 50% as effective.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You load your pistol with bullets doused in holy water, causing your Executions to deal an additional {ABIL_3002_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}. Any healing abilities that the victim uses over the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS} will become {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL1}% as effective.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Purity
data.description:
You load your pistol with bullets of purest silver, causing your Executions to deal an additional 225 Spirit damage. The victim's Initiative will be reduced by 50 for 10 seconds, and your Initiative will be increased by 50.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You load your pistol with bullets of purest silver, causing your Executions to deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}. The victim's Initiative will be reduced by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and your Initiative will be increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}.

This ability may be used while Incognito without breaking the effect.

data.name: Blood, Faith, And Fire
data.description: Any time you land a killing blow on your enemy, all of your groupmates within 30 feet will regain 75 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Any time you land a killing blow on your enemy, all of your groupmates within 30 feet will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Burn Armor
data.description: A surprise attack that burns your target, causing them to take 125 Spirit damage each time they use a melee attack for the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Accusations.
data.rawDescription: A surprise attack that burns your target, causing them to take {COM_1_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} each time they use a melee attack for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Your abilities will cost {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Builds 2 Accusations.

data.name: Burn Away Lies
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Target must be facing away from you
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent

3 Accusations: 1047 damage over time; 524 ending damage.

data.description: A savage counterattack that deals 227 damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.
data.rawDescription: A savage counterattack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and disarms your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Declare Anathema
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.
data.rawDescription: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to {ABIL_3033_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Divine Blast
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Dragon Gun
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A pistol shot that damages and knocks down your primary target and deals damage to all other enemies near them reducing their Morale by 125, inspired, your group gains 125 Morale.

2 Accusations: 189 damage, 35 feet radius.
3 Accusations: 231 damage, 40 feet radius.
4 Accusations: 273 damage, 43 feet radius.
5 Accusations: 314 damage, 48 feet radius.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Encourage Confession
data.description: Blessed Bullets of Confession will now also make the target 5% easier to critical hit.
data.rawDescription: Blessed Bullets of Confession will now also make the target {ABIL_3784_COM_2_VAL1}% easier to critical hit.

data.name: Excommunicate
data.description: For the next 15 seconds, heals will have no effects on your target.  The target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will suffer 1200 damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, heals will have no effects on your target.  The target and all other enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them will suffer {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Exit Wound
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent

You fire a hollow point shell, dealing damage immediately and reducing the target's Toughness, Strength, and Weapon Skill for 10 seconds.

2 Accusations: 318 damage; stats reduced by 75.
3 Accusations: 386 damage; stats reduced by 100.
4 Accusations: 452 damage; stats reduced by 125.

data.description: You regain 1197 health and 180 Action Points over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You regain {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} and {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_ACTIONPOINTS} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Expurgation
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 10 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet and snares them, reducing their run speed by 60%.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} and snares them, reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Fanatical Cleansing
data.description: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.
data.rawDescription: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.

data.name: Fanatical Zeal
data.description: You leap from the shadows, fueled with righteous anger. Your target will take 175 Spirit damage every time they use a magical ability for the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Accusations.
data.rawDescription: You leap from the shadows, fueled with righteous anger. Your target will take {COM_1_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} every time they use a magical ability for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Your abilities will cost {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Builds 2 Accusations.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.
data.rawDescription: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Fervor
data.description: A precise incision that deals 101 damage, and an additional 216 Spirit damage over 9 seconds.  This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.
data.rawDescription: A precise incision that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and an additional {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE} over {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.  This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flowing Accusations
data.description: All of your Executions gain a 50% chance to restore 2 Accusations.
data.rawDescription: All of your Executions gain a 50% chance to restore 2 Accusations.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You stare down your opponent, draining {COM_0_VAL0} of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by {COM_2_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Full Confession
data.description: Confess! no longer costs action points, and it will nearly always critically hit.
data.rawDescription: Confess! no longer costs action points, and it will nearly always critically hit.

data.name: Get Thee Behind Me!
data.description:
Detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.
data.rawDescription:
Detaunts all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Incognito
data.description: You begin quietly hunting for heretics, making it less likely that hostile monsters will notice you but slowly draining away your action points.  This effect will end if you use any abilities, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You begin quietly hunting for heretics, making it less likely that hostile monsters will notice you but slowly draining away your action points.  This effect will end if you use any abilities, or run out of action points.

data.name: Inquisitor's Fury
data.description: Each time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Corporeal damage over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Last Rites
data.description: Any time you land a killing blow on an enemy, you will regain 576 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you land a killing blow on an enemy, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.description: Increases the durations of Fanatical Zeal, Burn Armor, and Sudden Accusation by an additional 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the durations of Fanatical Zeal, Burn Armor, and Sudden Accusation by an additional 5 seconds.

data.name: Pick Lock
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.
data.rawDescription: You bolster yourself for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.rawDescription: A quick precision strike that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.rawDescription: Blessed Bullets of Purity will now heal you for 150% of the damage that they cause.

data.rawDescription: A directed strike that inflicts {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target.

data.description:
Rumored to be the death shroud of Magnus the Pious, this holy relic increases your chance to Disrupt enemy magic by 100% and make you resist all spell damage for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single relic at a time.

Rumored to be the death shroud of Magnus the Pious, this holy relic increases your chance to Disrupt enemy magic by {COM_0_VAL0}% and make you resist all spell damage for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Spirit resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Sanctified Oil
data.description:
You light and drop a flask of sanctified oil at your feet. You will become invisible to enemies for 2 seconds and increase your speed by 50% for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single relic at a time.
data.rawDescription:
You light and drop a flask of sanctified oil at your feet. You will become invisible to enemies for 2 seconds and increase your speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.
You may only use a single relic at a time.

data.name: Vindication
data.description: Each time you disrupt an enemy's spell, you will deal 35% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each time you disrupt an enemy's spell, you will deal {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Vitriolic Judgement
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in the back, there is a 25% chance that they will lose 225 points of Morale.
data.rawDescription: Any time you strike an enemy in the back, there is a 25% chance that they will lose {COM_1_VAL0} points of Morale.

data.name: Witchfinder's Protection
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet of you has a 50% increased chance to parry attacks for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Everyone in your group within 100 feet of you has a {COM_0_VAL0}% increased chance to parry attacks for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive 25% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.
data.rawDescription: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive {ABIL_3080_COM_0_VAL1}% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.

data.name: Witchfinders Judgement
data.description: You judge your group and find them worthy. Morale gain is doubled for 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You judge your group and find them worthy. Morale gain is doubled for 15 seconds.

data.name: Blessed Blade
data.description: Your Armour Penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds after successful use of your Executions.
data.rawDescription: Your Armour Penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds after successful use of your Executions.
